Miscellaneous Highlights: The Atlanta Braves selected the contract of RHP Dereck Rodriguez and he will replace Jared Shuster on the roster.
Others: Dylan Lee was transferred to the 60-day IL due to soreness in his left shoulder.
Rodriguez has appeared on the active roster for the Braves this season in three games allowing just one run over 3.1 innings.
Dereck Rodriguez commented on the moment he realized he was being called up & his relationship with other players in the clubhouse.
